title: Unspecified Error.... While patching
body:
So while I was updating to the newest patch a window popped up where it said, "unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." 

Now I looked on the boards for possible solutions. but none of them seem to work. 

I have an acer computer with windows 10....please help

replies.body: I'd like to gather some more information to try and help!  At what percent are you receiving this error?  Would you happen to have a screenshot?  Let me know!
The error would unusually pop up at 48%. I've tried checking my logs and re-installing. But nothing seems to work.

At this point, your patch is trying to download new files but is somehow being prevented from doing so.  This is usually a result of a network issue preventing the download.  I recommend going through our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guides, and you should be good to go!  Hope that helps!

Sorry to say that nothing worked from the player support and connection issues guide. I will probably no longer be playing league of legends due to this issue. Thanks for all your help but I'm done trying.
